菋字的基本解释

菋
wèi
一种药材，即“五味子”。

菋字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wèi］
［《廣韻》無沸切，去未，微。］
亦作“苿1”。
五味子。木兰科五味子属植物的泛称。

菋字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　菋； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1037第12
【唐韻】無沸切。音味。【說文】荎藸也。【爾雅·釋草】菋，荎藸。【註】五味也。又【集韻】暮拜切，音韎。義同。　亦作苿。

考證：〔【說文】荎蕏也。【爾雅·釋草】菋，荎蕏。〕　謹照原文兩蕏字?改藸。
菋字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
菋字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Stalk
wèi
A kind of medicinal material, namely "Schisandra".
Stalk
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wèi］
["Guangyun" has no boiled cuts, gone, and micro. ]
Also known as "苿1".
Schisandra. General term for the schisandra of the Magnoliaceae.
Stalk
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Chinese Characters] 　菋; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1037-12
【Tang Yun】No boiling cut. Timbre. [Said the text] Water chestnut also. 【Erya·Shuicao】cow, sable. [Note] Five flavors. Also 【Jiyun】Twilight worships and cuts, the sound is Kun. The same meaning.　 also for 苿. Textual research: [[Said the text] Nian Ye Ye. 【Erya·Shucao】菋, 莏菋. 〕 　 Would you like to follow the original two 蕏 characters? Change the 藸.
